title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.C: RESILIENCE BUILDING & SYSTEM PERSEVERATION

description.narrative: Vulnerable populations continue to receive safe water supply and basic sanitation services at community and institutional (health facilities) levels., which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Adolescent girls and boys, mothers and fathers, and community leaders in 106 districts adopt 11 key life-saving, care and protective behaviours for children and women

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Vulnerable populations continue to receive safe water supply and basic sanitation services at community and institutional (healthfacilities) levels.

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened the capacity of local communities and institutions for more durable and addressing the root causes of many of the emerging WASH related diseases. Continuity of providing water and sanitation services through reviving/preserving the existing infrastructure, both in rural and urban context one the interventions UNICEF supported during 2020. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:17/01/2021
